dict.acceptation: 货币；通用，流通，流传，传播；市价，行情；流通时间；

sent.orig: The devaluation of any major currency today simply exports deflationary pressure to other currency currency.
sent.trans: 当前，任何主要货币贬值都仅仅会对其他货币区造成通缩压力。

sent.orig: For exchange-traded currency hedging instruments, the main types are currency options and currency futures.
sent.trans: 对于保护自由流通外币的措施，主要的类型是货币选择和货币的未来。

sent.orig: In indirect quotation, the rate is expressed in units of foreign currency to local currency prices.
sent.trans: 在间接标价法下，汇率是以外国货币来表示的单位本国货币的价格。

sent.orig: Part three elaborates on the implications of e-currency for the theory of currency supply and demand.
sent.trans: 第三部分分别阐述了电子货币对货币供给理论和需求理论的影响。

sent.orig: Foreign currency demand deposit and foreign currency deposit.
sent.trans: 办理外币活期储蓄和外币定期储蓄。
